actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of certain mineral interests of the United States in property in California to the record owners of the surface of that property.

summary.text: Authorizes the conveyance of specified mineral interests of the United States in property in Los Angeles County in California to the record owners of the surface of such property.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of certain mineral interests of the United States in property in California to the record owners of the surface of that property.
